subs.text: @AsafShaloo @drvolts By transmitting power along lines that weren’t originally optimized for that purpose. So it becomes a transmission problem.
subs.rawText: @AsafShaloo @drvolts By transmitting power along lines that weren’t originally optimized for that purpose. So it becomes a transmission problem.

subs.text: @AsafShaloo @drvolts Problem because electrification significantly increases electric demand, and solar/wind generates it at different times and places than where it is consumed.
subs.rawText: @AsafShaloo @drvolts Problem because electrification significantly increases electric demand, and solar/wind generates it at different times and places than where it is consumed.

subs.text: @AsafShaloo Transmission is currently a Big Problem. See @drvolts who is worth a follow both as an energy expert and someone really good at writing really complicated, really long technical stories that read very, very smoothly.
subs.rawText: @AsafShaloo Transmission is currently a Big Problem. See @drvolts who is worth a follow both as an energy expert and someone really good at writing really complicated, really long technical stories that read very, very smoothly.

subs.text: @AsafShaloo @drvolts Local storage is probably more efficient and cheaper than shuffling electrons across the continent.
subs.rawText: @AsafShaloo @drvolts Local storage is probably more efficient and cheaper than shuffling electrons across the continent.
